alert.note: Alert for Denton; Tarrant (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 01 at 2:29PM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Denton and northeastern Tarrant Counties through 300 PM CDT... At 228 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Trophy Club, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Lewisville, Flower Mound, Grapevine, Keller, Coppell, Southlake, Colleyville, Trophy Club, Roanoke, Double Oak, Northlake, Bartonville, Westlake and Marshall Creek. This includes Interstate 35W between mile markers 67 and 74. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
